title: Did Yardi Gras replace Mardi Gras in New Orleans?
subtitle: The New Orleans population set a slightly different holiday in 2021 due to the Corona virus epidemic.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The Mardi Gras parade was cancelled in 2021 to curb the spread of COVID-19. Instead, some people decorated their homes like show buoys in a direction some call "Yardi Gra."
